plugins.name: SQL Injection Detector
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Detects SQL injection vulnerabilities through pattern matching and active payload verification (error-based, time-based, boolean-based)

plugins.name: XSS Vulnerability Detector
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Detects Cross-Site Scripting vulnerabilities through passive analysis and active payload verification

plugins.name: Sensitive Information Detector
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Detects sensitive information disclosure in HTTP responses including API keys, credentials, PII, and debug information

plugins.name: URL Encoder/Decoder
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Encode and decode text using various schemes (URL, Base64, HTML entities, Hex, Unicode)

plugins.name: Hash Calculator
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Calculate cryptographic hashes (MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512) with optional HMAC support
